benefits.title: The excitement and delight of great new music.
benefits.problem: People with great tastes in music will rise to the top,
benefits.solution: making it easier to find profiles worth listening to.

benefits.title: The exhilaration of sharing your music taste.
benefits.problem: Our 'Spotlight' feature shows you the users that resonate with their audience the most,
benefits.solution: so you can show off your music taste to everyone on the platform.

benefits.title: The enjoyment of a whole new music ecosystem.
benefits.problem: We're putting music discovery in the hands of the tastemakers, the curators, the creators,
benefits.solution: for you to experience the reciprocal exchange of excitement that music was meant for.
